_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

States of feeling [sn45.11:2.13]: Feeling conditioned by desire, thought, and perception
Feeling conditioned by the stilling of desire, thought, and perception
Feeling conditioned by the attainment of the unattained state.
